00037 /*
00038  * Model_Refiner.h
00039  *
00040  *
00041  *
00042  *  Created on: 23-Dec-2010
00043  *      
00044  */
00045 
00046 #ifndef MODEL_REFINER_H_
00047 #define MODEL_REFINER_H_
00048 
00049 #include "google/protobuf/message.h"
00050 
00051 //!An interface that defines the necessary refinements
00052 //!for refining the LDA graphical model and its extensions.
00053 /**
00054  * A refinement is defined as an operation done to improve
00055  * the model like sampling. The definition is also extended
00056  * to operations that enable a refinement like reading documents
00057  * and evaluating log-likelihoods.
00058  *
00059  * The provider of a model's implementation has to implement
00060  * this interface suitably
00061  */
00062 class Model_Refiner {
00063 public:
00064     virtual google::protobuf::Message* allocate_document_buffer(size_t) = 0;
00065     virtual void deallocate_document_buffer(google::protobuf::Message*) = 0;
00066     virtual google::protobuf::Message* get_nth_document(
00067             google::protobuf::Message* docs, size_t n) = 0;
00068     virtual void* read(google::protobuf::Message&) = 0;
00069     virtual void* sample(void*) = 0;
00070     virtual void* test(void*) = 0;
00071     virtual void* update(void*) = 0;
00072     virtual void* optimize(void*) = 0;
00073     virtual void* eval(void*, double&) = 0;
00074     virtual void write(void*) = 0;
00075     virtual void iteration_done() = 0;
00076 };
00077 
00078 #endif /* MODEL_REFINER_H_ */
Generated on Tue Jul 19 11:45:24 2011 for Y!LDA by  1.6.3
